tweet_text:
@TheKixg Escapism is for the struggle people put us through because of our disabilities, not to actually escape having the disability
We don't mind being disabled we mind being misrepresented or underrepresented, i just cant picture EA doing it correctly despite hoping ANYTHING gets added
